name: A Hebrew Word A Day
description: Very simple and efficient when you want to learn a new language, simply get a new word each day.  Each day you will receive a notification at the desired time informing you a new word is available. It will be displayed with its translation.  You did forget a translation ? Dont worry, all words and their translation are saved in a list that you can display at any time.  With this method you can learn gradually without difficulty.
